titles.title: A resolution congratulating the University of North Carolina Tar Heels for winning the 2009 National Collegiate Athletic Association Field Hockey National Championship.
A resolution congratulating the University of North Carolina Tar Heels for winning the 2009 National Collegiate Athletic Association Field Hockey National Championship.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Congratulates the University of North Carolina on winning the 2009 National Collegiate Athletic Association Field Hockey National Championship.
